location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 14 to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: A slim portion of text is missing on the right-hand side of Page 7.

mods.abstract: Short note that acknowledges letters received from Bombay and explains that the EagleSnow's sudden dispatch express to Bombay (with a declaration of war) prevented earlier acknowledgement via the EagleSnow. Shipped by Ormuze [Hormuz] Gallivat. A note states that a duplicate of the message was sent on 8 January 1779.
